ygData.subject: Re: Utility of Lullaby and Invisibility songs
ygData.msgSnippet: I just started in Hpass Hold last night and I can definately confirm this...It actually made me shake my head and laugh to myself when it happened because I
ygData.messageBody:
I just started in Hpass Hold last night and I can definately confirm
this...It actually made me shake my head and laugh to myself when it
happened because I expected it...

I walked up the ridge near the Gnoll spawn points and rounded the corner to
stumble across 2 high level players beating on a Soothsayer...I stopped to
watch and the thing, already down to 1/2 hit points, turned around and
started casting on me...this is totally ridiculous.

- Faras of Qeynos

>
> As several people have pointed out, mobs that *other* people
> are attacking, unrelated to your party, will come over and
> start whacking on you. Sometimes even when you're not
> singing.
>
> Surely it can't be intended that the gnoll soothsayer the
> other group is fighting turns around every 5 seconds to cast a
> spell on me even though they are beating the crap out of it
> and the only thing I'm doing is watching and singing
> Accelerando on myself.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
>
> --------------------------------------------------------------
> ----------
> How has ONElist changed your life?
> Share your story with us at http://www.onelist.com
>
